page.title: 07Arbroath Abbey, Custodian.
page.content: Today we went down to the Arbroath Abbey and we met the caretaker, Bert Mc,Nulty and we talked to him about his job, and what he had to do. He said he had to make sure everything was kept in good condition. He polished the floors of the museum and dusted but his main job is to show the abbey. He also helped the gardeners if necessary.The day we went, he was trimming the edges of the grass.Mr Mc,Nulty said the people he likes to see are school children to rnow that they are studying their Scottish History.he said he could get around 60 thousand visitors each year each summer and and the question he is asked most is were the king was buried?.We really enyoyed the vist to the abbey because it has an atmosphere of its own
